import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { events } from '../utils/mockEventData'; import { Badge } from '../components/ui/badge'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardFooter, CardHeader, CardTitle, } from '../components/ui/card'; import { Carousel, CarouselContent, CarouselItem, CarouselNext, CarouselPrevious, } from '../components/ui/carousel'; function HomePage() { // Format price for display const formatPrice = (price) => { if (typeof price === 'object') { // Return the lowest price if price is an object with multiple tiers const prices = Object.values(price); return `$${Math.min(...prices)}`; } return price; // If price is already formatted }; const renderEventCard = (event) => (
{event.category}
{event.title} {event.location}
{event.date} at {event.time}
{formatPrice(event.price)} e.stopPropagation()} className="bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium py-1.5 px-4 rounded-md text-sm flex items-center gap-1" > Get Tickets ); return (

Welcome to Ticketmaster 2.0

Discover and book tickets for the best events happening near you

Trending Events

{events.map(renderEventCard)}

Upcoming Events

{[...events].reverse().map(renderEventCard)}

Discover Events

Find upcoming concerts, sports events, theater shows, and more.

Secure Tickets

Purchase tickets safely with our secure checkout process.

Manage Events

Keep track of your tickets and upcoming events in one place.

); } export default HomePage;
